title: How to Get Rid of Demons

steps.title: Rule out non-demonic causes first.
steps.content: Rule out non-demonic causes first. It's possible to mistake ordinary problems for demons. You'll feel silly if you seek out supernatural solutions for something that turns out to be a leaky pipe or a hypertension headache. Do your due diligence and check for mundane sources. Get your house checked if you hear, smell, or feel strange things in a specific area. You may have problems with plumbing, electricity, gas leaks, rodents, or other mundane issues. The sooner you act, the easier it will be to fix. Get a doctor checkup for anyone who feels bad or has behavior you don't understand. Rule out common medical concerns before assuming there are demons. Things like depression, epilepsy, autism , or migraines could be mistaken for demons when the person actually needs a different type of support. [1] X Trustworthy Source World Health Organization Health information and news provided by the World Health Organization Go to source Get someone to a doctor quickly if they hear voices or are a danger to themselves. Health issues like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, brain tumors, and UTIs (in older people) can cause hallucinations and strange behavior. Protect them and get them into a doctor's care in case there's a medical solution.

steps.title: Burn sage
steps.content: Burn sage to clear out demons. Make sure all the doors and windows are open so the demons can get out, then light the sage and let it burn for 30 seconds before you blow the flame out. Allow the sage to smolder and the smoke to cleanse the space of negative energy. [2] X Research source Waft the smoke into the corners of the room including the nooks and crannies so the negative energy can’t accumulate there. If you can’t smoke in your home or apartment, add a few drops of white sage essential oil to a spray bottle filled with water and mist the room.

steps.title: Say a prayer to get rid of the demons.
steps.content: Say a prayer to get rid of the demons. Whatever your religion, praying out loud can help you get rid of them. Say the prayer over and over as you move about the space so the demons are driven out. [3] X Research source Psalm 23 is a popular verse to recite to radiate positive energy and drive the demons out. Chant your own prayer or mantra that repeats a positive intention while also banishing any demons. For example, you could say something like, “No demons are welcome in this space, I command you to leave. This is a place of light and love.”

steps.title: Bang pots and pans to scare away any demons in your home.
steps.content: Bang pots and pans to scare away any demons in your home. Some people bang pots and pans together at the beginning of a new year to scare away the ghosts from the previous year. But you can also drive out any demons in your home by walking around the entire place banging pots and pans loudly. [4] X Research source Try repeating a mantra or prayer while you bang the pots and pans. Warn all residents first so they can get ear protection or leave the area.

steps.title: Sprinkle holy water around your home.
steps.content: Sprinkle holy water around your home. Many people believe holy water will drive away demons. Call your local church and ask them if you can have a bottle of holy water. Sprinkle some of the water all over your home, making sure you get the corners and windows.

steps.title: Call a professional to help you get rid of the demons.
steps.content: Call a professional to help you get rid of the demons. If you’re unable to drive the demons away on your own, you can call a priest or spiritual healer to come help you. They can come to your home or meet with you to discuss possible causes and remedies. For example, a priest or healer may be able to pray over you to help you get rid of your demons. Look online for professionals near you, but be wary of scams . Don’t give them any money until you’re satisfied that they got rid of your demons.

steps.title: Avoid negative films or music in your home.
steps.content: Avoid negative films or music in your home. If demons feed off of negative energies, then aggressive movies, music, graphic art, and other forms of violent or negative expressions can attract and feed them. Keep your space free and clear of negative energies. [5] X Research source Keep your home and space full of kind and good energy by playing happy music and displaying art that moves you in a positive way.

steps.title: Charge cleansing crystals under a full moon.
steps.content: Charge cleansing crystals under a full moon. Many people use crystals as a means of clearing away negative energy. Crystals placed in the light of a full moon are said to absorb the energy and “recharge.” They can then be placed around the house to ward off negative energy, which can help get rid of demons. Place the crystals on a windowsill or outside under a full moon. The best crystals for cleansing negative energy are kyanite, selenite, obsidian, hematite, and desert rose.

steps.title: Sprinkle salt in the corners of your house and doorways.
steps.content: Sprinkle salt in the corners of your house and doorways. Salt has been used for thousands of years by different cultures to ward off evil spirits. Sprinkle salt in all of the corners in your home as well as the entrance to your home to keep demons from coming back and settling in. [6] X Research source Add more salt every couple of months so there’s always a small amount present.

steps.title: Wear an item or talisman that is important to you to protect yourself.
steps.content: Wear an item or talisman that is important to you to protect yourself. Crosses, necklaces, and other religious items can hold power and keep demons away if they’re important to you. Wear them to protect yourself and keep them around your home to keep demons from entering. [7] X Research source Wear your rosary to keep demons away. Some examples include a crucifix on a wall or a dream catcher above your bed. The item doesn’t have to be religious. For example, if a friend made a bracelet for you to protect you, that can work to get rid of demons, too.

steps.title: Identify your negative thoughts to keep demons from gathering.
steps.content: Identify your negative thoughts to keep demons from gathering. Many people believe that demons feed off of negative energy, which means that you can get rid of demons by learning how to control your energy. That starts with recognizing and dealing with your negative thoughts. If you’re able to recognize them, then you can counteract them. [8] X Research source For example, if you find yourself thinking that you’re ugly or a failure, take a moment to reflect and realize that these are negative thoughts. Then try saying something kinder to yourself. Even if negative thoughts happen automatically, you can learn to recognize and interrupt them. Over time, you’ll get better at catching and preventing negative thoughts from happening.

steps.title: Think positively
steps.content: Think positively to drive demons away. Whenever you identify or recognize that you’re having negative thoughts, try to replace them with positive thoughts. If demons feed off of negative energy and thoughts, then positive thoughts will get rid of them. [9] X Research source For instance, if you’re looking in a mirror and you realize that you’re thinking something negative about yourself, like you don’t like your nose or your skin, try replacing it with something positive by focusing on what you do like about yourself.

steps.title: Fill your home and life with kindness, warmth, and support.
steps.content: Fill your home and life with kindness, warmth, and support. Feelings of love, openness, and respect leave little room for evil. Try spending extra time being good to other people. This has positive effects both immediately and over time. Work on fixing any bad habits you might have. Things like passive aggression, excessive complaining, gossiping, or judging others invite negativity into your life. Work on respectful, assertive, and nonjudgmental behavior. Set polite boundaries with people who stir up trouble or make you feel bad about yourself.

steps.title: Meditate
steps.content: Meditate to control your emotions and take away power from demons. If you let your fear or anger about demons overwhelm you, they can use that energy to gain strength and power over you. To keep them weak and drive them away, practice meditation and clear your mind of negative emotional responses like fear and anger. Focus on a positive mental image, like a peaceful sunrise, so you can radiate positive energy. [10] X Trustworthy Source American Psychological Association Leading scientific and professional organization of licensed psychologists Go to source Don’t let demons consume your thoughts by worrying about them all of the time, or you’re giving them exactly what they want: control over your mind.

steps.title: Talk to someone about your negative thoughts so you can manage them.
steps.content: Talk to someone about your negative thoughts so you can manage them. It may be helpful for you to talk to a priest, pastor, friend, or therapist about the negative thoughts that you’re having. They may be able to help you deal with them and keep them from overtaking you. [11] X Research source It's normal and okay to have difficult thoughts at times, but if they feel overwhelming, talking to the right person can help you. Prayer is also a form of communication that may allow you to talk to a higher power about your negative emotions and thoughts. Frequent and intense negative thoughts are sometimes a sign of mental illness like anxiety or depression. These are treatable, so talk to your doctor and ask for help.
